alert.note: Alert for Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 7:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Embarrass River near Embarrass affecting Waupaca and Shawano Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Embarrass River near Embarrass. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, There is widespread flooding of lowland and agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.
